```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)

options(tibble.print_min = 5)

```

```{r}
pulse_df = 
  haven::read_sas("./data_import_examples/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") |>
  janitor::clean_names()

pulse_df

pulse_tidy_df = 
  pivot_longer(
    pulse_df, 
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit", 
    values_to = "bdi")

pulse_tidy_df

```
